articles.description: Given a chance to do it all again, how would NFL teams handle Round 1 of the 2022 draft? There'd be some shuffling up top, for starters.
articles.content: In football, grading in the moment is impossible. Grading an entire draft within a year is also pretty difficult, but its possible the year provides evidence of true progress and, perhaps, adjusts fu… [+17620 chars]
